Ghost healers are enemies encountered in the Zemouregal & Vorkath boss fight.

When summoned, they will heal Vorkath for 1,000 health every few ticks, which does not scale accordingly to group size.

Life points[edit | edit source]

The healer's life points scale accordingly to the amount of players in the instance when they were summoned.

Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard) Players Life points (normal) Life points (hard)
